title: brives887
author: brives887
content: MEXC Futures(mexc.com) is happy to announce a brand new giveaway, in which a complete of 3,500 USDT futures bonuses are up for grabs!1,000 USDT futures bonus giveaway is open to new futures customers and present futures customers who've now no longer traded on MEXC Futures seeing that 2022/05/10 00:00 (UTC).During the occasion period, customers who exchange on each the testnest and the mainnet with futures buying and selling volume > 1,000 USDT (any futures pairs) can be eligible to every acquire a five USDT futures bonus on a first-come, first-served basis.
